messages.title: Message from Gordon Henderson...
messages.content: There are over 42,000 homes in Sittingbourne and Sheppey. That makes it impossible for me to call on them all personally. However, if you would like to talk to me please email me at vote4gordonhenderson@gmail.com or ring me on 01795437377. Similarly, if you would like to help me in my campaign for re-election, please make a poster, or would simply like to register your support for me, you can do so by visiting my website www.vote4gordonhenderson.com, or by using the contact details above.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: To support Theresa May and her team as they negotiate the best Brexit deal possible.
To work with our local Clinical Commissioning Group and NHS England to improve health provision in our area.
To lobby the Government to ensure our local schools get the extra money they need.
To continue supporting local charities, particularly those who help the elderly and the disabled.
To work with local authorities to attract new businesses to our area. To encourage local businesses to expand and create new jobs to bring down unemployment.
To ensure Highways England delivers its upgrade to the Stockbury Roundabout and Kent Highways improves Sheppey’s Lower Road.
To continue raising in Parliament problems that affect Sittingbourne and Sheppey.
To campaign even harder against the scourge of litter and fly-tipping.
To remain at the heart of our community and be accessible to my constituents.
